title: Cheese and Cold Cuts Platter
ingredients: variety of at least 2-3 different kinds of cheese (e.g. blue cheese, mountain cheese, brie, herb cream cheese, cheddar, young gouda)
variety of at least 2-3 different kinds of cold cuts (e.g. smoked salami, serrano ham, cooked ham, salami)
variety of fillers (e.g. round crackers, crispbread, baguette, cheese sticks)
variety of vegetables, fruits & nuts (e.g. red grapes, cherry tomatoes, herb olives, pistachios, nuts)
variety of jams or chutneys (e.g. apricot jam, fig mustard)
instructions: 1. Start by placing the largest components on the board, using at least 3 different kinds of cheese. Cut them into smaller pieces. 2. Create structure with small bowls containing olives, cheese crackers, or jam. 3. Arrange the cold cuts attractively around the cheeses, folding the slices slightly for volume. 4. Add fillers like cheese sticks or baguette as desired. 5. Fill gaps with red grapes, cherry tomatoes, and nuts for color. Enjoy your cheese and cold cuts platter!
